Test Name: Antimicrobial Susceptibility Testing of Rapidly Growing Acid-Fast Bacilli (AFB)
Specimen Type: Clinical isolates of rapidly growing acid-fast bacilli
Purpose: To determine the antimicrobial susceptibility profile of rapidly growing acid-fast bacilli for optimal patient care.
Container: Frozen cryovial or culture tube used to store the isolate at −70 °C
Equipment: BACTEC MGIT 960 system, Middlebrook 7H10/7H11 agar plates, incubator set at 35–37 °C
